snippet: General Motors Co said the same engineer was responsible for the design of ignition switches on 5.95 million GM vehicles recalled this year....

headline.print_headline: Same Engineer Designed Switches on 5.95 Million Recalled GM Cars
headline.main: Same Engineer Designed Switches on 5.95 Million Recalled GM Cars

lead_paragraph: General Motors Co said the same engineer was responsible for the design of ignition switches on 5.95 million GM vehicles recalled this year.
